title: Progress Software Kemp LoadMaster mangle Stack-based Buffer Overflow Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
description:
This vulnerability allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code on affected installations of Progress Software Kemp LoadMaster. Authentication is not required to exploit this vulnerability. 
The specific flaw exists within the mangle executable. The issue results from the lack of proper validation of the length of user-supplied data prior to copying it to a fixed-length stack-based buffer. An attacker can leverage this vulnerability to execute code in the context of the bal user.
addtionnal_details: Progress Software has issued an update to correct this vulnerability. More details can be found at:https://docs.progress.com/bundle/release-notes_loadmaster-7-2-61-1/page/Security-Updates.html
